mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID AS productId, PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, PRICE AS price, DESCRIPTION AS description, PICTURE_URL AS pictureUrl FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRICE, DESCRIPTION, PICTURE_URL ) VALUES( SEQ_PRODUCT.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{price}, #{description}, #{pictureUrl} )
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID AS productId, PRODUCT_NAME AS productName, PRICE AS price, DESCRIPTION AS description, PICTURE_URL AS pictureUrl FROM PRODUCT where PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
